content.p: You may need to pay a tuition fee deposit as part of your preparations to study at Nottingham â€“ either when accepting an offer for selected courses, or as part of the process of obtaining a CAS for a student visa application, or both. Find out more in our frequently asked questions on the links below. Students who need to pay both types of deposit should refer to both FAQ pages. Deposits for international students entering foundation courses and postgraduate taught masters courses.
